COMM_ACCESS_Q2h.primary: We have not yet secured the funding to be able to hire someone in these communities to deliver programming.

COMM_ACCESS_Q3k.primary: Alberta Foundation for the Arts gave us $150K over the next three years. We are using $70K of it in our fiscal due to the AFA fiscal timing difference (April to March).

COMM_ACCESS_Q4c.primary:
Fort McMurray: Local Immigration Partnership (this is the name of the agency)
Calgary: Centre for Newcomers (CFN)

COMM_ACCESS_Q5a.primary:
100 tickets in total for Once Upon A Time and Nijinsky
Welcoming Newcomers - Calgary: Immigrants Services Calgary, Canadian Immigrant Women's Association
Welcoming Newcomers - Edmonton: Action for Healthy Communities

Caregiver's Intermission - Calgary: Woods Homes, Caregivers Alberta
Caregiver's Intermission - Edmonton: Norwood Child and Family Resource Centre

COMM_ACCESS_Q6c.primary: Not at this time. Need more dancers or more time in the schedule to be able to do this.

COMM_ACCESS_Q4l.primary:
Calgary Foundation (Weekly programming at Calgary’s Centre for Newcomers 2025) ($71K)
Nickle Foundation (Weekly programming at Calgary’s Centre for Newcomers 2026) ($32K)
Chawkers Foundation (support for programs outside of Calgary and Edmonton) ($30K)
Canadian Tire Jumpstart (support for programs outside of Calgary and Edmonton ($10K)

COMM_ACCESS_Q1l.primary:
Calgary Flames Foundation (Southern Alberta outreach classes) ($5K)
Chawkers Foundation (support for programs outside of Calgary and Edmonton) ($30K)
Canadian Tire Jumpstart (support for programs outside of Calgary and Edmonton ($10K)

COMM_ACCESS_Q1e.primary: Feedback will be collected on completion of the program

COMM_ACCESS_Q4e.primary:
Program is ongoing.
For the short-term program, feedback is collected at the end of 8 weeks 
For CFN, feedback is collected mid-year

COMM_ACCESS_Q5b.primary: these are new audiences, not repeat attendance, both from the newcomer communities and from the caregiver communtiy
